changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM aud_excluded_schemas aes USING aud_excluded_schemas aes1 WHERE aes.schema_name = aes1.schema_name AND aes.id > aes1.id

changeSet.author: rgogolev
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM aud_excluded_tables aet USING aud_excluded_tables aet1 WHERE aet.table_name = aet1.table_name AND aet.id > aet1.id

changeSet.author: rgogolev

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from pg_constraint where conname='aud_excluded_schemas_schema_name_uq' and contype='u';

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE aud_excluded_schemas ADD CONSTRAINT aud_excluded_schemas_schema_name_uq UNIQUE (schema_name);

changeSet.author: rgogolev

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from pg_constraint where conname='aud_excluded_tables_table_name_uq' and contype='u';

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE aud_excluded_tables ADD CONSTRAINT aud_excluded_tables_table_name_uq UNIQUE (table_name);

changeSet.author: rgogolev
changeSet.sql: update aud_excluded_columns aec set table_name = 'public.' || aec.table_name where split_part(aec.table_name, '.',2) = '';

changeSet.author: rgogolev

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from pg_constraint where conname='aud_excluded_tables_check_schema' and contype='c';
